result.execSummary:
The defendant John G Moon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Receiving Stolen Property >$5000 - $10,000 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.34(1)(bm).
  • Theft-Movable Property >$2500-$5000 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/costs to be paid through Clerk of Courts Office - 60 days to pay or setup payment plan.
May not possess/use firearms or body armor.

May not vote until civil rights are restored.  
May not hold public office.
If not US citizen may face deportation or lose other citizenship rights.  
NO Contact with Jason West, Tyler Chute, Shawn Thompson and Mr. & Mrs. Kahl or their residence - 1956 100th Street, Polk County.
Must provide DNA sample - NO surcharge.
Restitution assessed under Count 3.  ***Per Court Order on 11/5/2019, Restitution assessed on Count 3 is to be collected immediately and not wait for supervision to begin for Count 3.***

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

miscConds.notes:
Compas and follow recommendations.  
Must provide DNA sample - No surcharge.   
NO Contact with Jason West, Tyler Chute, Shawn Thompson and Mr. & Mrs. Kahl or their residence - 1956 100th Street, Polk County.

$12,500.00, plus 10% surcharge of $1,250.00, for a total of $13,750.00 Restitution, to be paid to Probation.  Joint & Several with Tyler Chute (14CF53), Jason West (14CF70) & Shawn Thompson (14CF54).  Any portion that can be taken out of prison fund/wages may be applied.  Any unpaid amount at the time of discharge from Probation may be reduced to a civil judgment.  ***Per Court Order on 11/5/2019, Restitution is to be collected immediately during the sentence period of the entire case and not wait for supervision to begin for Count 3.***
